mapper.select:
/** * Query ID : selectLoginUserList * Description : 로그인 사용자 조회 * Author : 변승우 **/
SELECT USR_ID , USR_NM , PWD , BLN_NM , DEPT_NM , RSP_BSN_NM , PST_NM , AUT_ID , CPN , CASE WHEN (TO_TIMESTAMP(USR_EXPR_DT||'235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') < NOW()) THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS USR_EXPR_DT , USE_YN , FRST_REGR_ID , FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDFR_ID , LST_MDF_DTM FROM T_USR_I WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #{usr_id}

/** * Query ID : selectMasterCheck * Description : HA구성 master 체크 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT count(NULLIF(A.master_couble_chk, 0)) as master_couble_chk_cnt FROM ( SELECT case when count(DB_SVR_ID) > 1 then 1 else 0 end as master_couble_chk FROM T_DBSVRIPADR_I WHERE MASTER_GBN ='M' GROUP BY DB_SVR_ID ) A

/** * Query ID : selectDbServerList * Description : DB서버 리스트 조회 * Author : 변승우 **/
SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM , (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS IDX , AA.DB_SVR_ID , AA.DB_SVR_NM , AA.IPADR , AA.PORTNO , AA.MASTER_GBN , AA.DFT_DB_NM , AA.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , AA.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD , AA.FRST_REGR_ID , AA.FRST_REG_DTM , AA.LST_MDFR_ID , AA.LST_MDF_DTM FROM( SELECT A.DB_SVR_ID , A.DB_SVR_NM , B.IPADR , B.PORTNO , B.MASTER_GBN , A.DFT_DB_NM , A.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , A.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD , A.FRST_REGR_ID , A.FRST_REG_DTM , A.LST_MDFR_ID , A.LST_MDF_DTM FROM T_DBSVR_I A, T_DBSVRIPADR_I B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DB_SVR_ID = B.DB_SVR_ID AND A.DB_SVR_NM = #{db_svr_nm} AND B.MASTER_GBN = 'M' ORDER BY LST_MDF_DTM DESC ) AA

/** * Query ID : "selectDashboardServerInfoImg" * Description : 서버 정보 조회 * Author : 박태혁 **/ SELECT AAA.DB_SVR_ID AS db_svr_id , AAA.IPADR as ipadr , (SELECT DB_SVR_NM FROM T_DBSVR_I WHERE DB_SVR_ID = AAA.DB_SVR_ID) AS db_svr_nm , (SELECT SVR_HOST_NM FROM T_DBSVRIPADR_I WHERE DB_SVR_ID = AAA.DB_SVR_ID AND IPADR = AAA.IPADR) AS svr_host_nm , (SELECT DB_SVR_NM FROM T_DBSVR_I WHERE DB_SVR_ID = AAA.DB_SVR_ID) AS db_svr_nm , AAA.MASTER_GBN as master_gbn , (SELECT DISTINCT AGT_CNDT_CD FROM T_AGTCNDT_I WHERE IPADR = AAA.IPADR) AS agt_cndt_cd , AAA.PORTNO AS portno , AAA.DFT_DB_NM AS dft_db_nm FROM ( SELECT A.DB_SVR_ID AS DB_SVR_ID , D.IPADR AS IPADR , D.MASTER_GBN AS MASTER_GBN , D.PORTNO AS PORTNO , A.DFT_DB_NM AS DFT_DB_NM FROM T_DBSVR_I A JOIN T_DBSVRIPADR_I D ON A.DB_SVR_ID = D.DB_SVR_ID WHERE A.DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id} ) AAA GROUP BY AAA.DB_SVR_ID, AAA.IPADR , AAA.MASTER_GBN, AAA.PORTNO, AAA.DFT_DB_NM ORDER BY AAA.DB_SVR_ID, AAA.MASTER_GBN, AAA.IPADR

/** * Query ID : selectServerInfo * Description : DB서버 정보 조회 * Author : 박태혁 **/ SELECT A.DB_SVR_ID , A.DB_SVR_NM , B.IPADR , B.PORTNO , B.MASTER_GBN , A.DFT_DB_NM , A.PGHOME_PTH , A.PGDATA_PTH , A.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , A.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD , A.FRST_REGR_ID , A.FRST_REG_DTM , A.LST_MDFR_ID , A.LST_MDF_DTM FROM T_DBSVR_I A, T_DBSVRIPADR_I B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DB_SVR_ID = B.DB_SVR_ID AND A.DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id} AND B.MASTER_GBN = 'M'

/** * Query ID : selectAgentInfo * Description : Agent 정보 조회 * Author : 박태혁 **/ SELECT AGT_SN , IPADR , SOCKET_PORT , AGT_CNDT_CD , STRT_DTM , ISTCNF_YN , FRST_REGR_ID , FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDFR_ID , LST_MDF_DTM FROM T_AGTCNDT_I WHERE IPADR = #{IPADR} LIMIT 1

/** * Query ID : selectIpadrList * Description : 아이피 정보 조회 * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT A.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID, A.DB_SVR_ID, A.IPADR, A.PORTNO, A.MASTER_GBN, A.FRST_REGR_ID, A.FRST_REG_DTM, A.LST_MDFR_ID, A.LST_MDF_DTM, A.SVR_HOST_NM, (SELECT INTL_IPADR FROM T_AGTCNDT_I WHERE IPADR=A.IPADR) AS INTL_IPADR FROM T_DBSVRIPADR_I A WHERE 1=1 AND db_svr_id = #{db_svr_id} ORDER BY MASTER_GBN ASC
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteIpadr * Description : 아이피 정보 삭제 * Author : 변승우 **/ DELETE FROM T_DBSVRIPADR_I WHERE 1=1 AND db_svr_id = #{db_svr_id}

/** * Query ID : selectAllIpadrList * Description : DB서버 정보 조회(Master, Slave) * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT A.DB_SVR_ID , A.DB_SVR_NM , B.IPADR , B.PORTNO , B.MASTER_GBN , A.DFT_DB_NM , A.PGHOME_PTH , A.PGDATA_PTH , A.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , A.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD , A.FRST_REGR_ID , A.FRST_REG_DTM , A.LST_MDFR_ID , A.LST_MDF_DTM , B.SVR_HOST_NM , B.DB_CNDT FROM T_DBSVR_I A, T_DBSVRIPADR_I B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DB_SVR_ID = B.DB_SVR_ID AND A.DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id}
/** * Query ID : selectWrkErrorMsg * Description : 작업로그정보 * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT RSLT_MSG FROM T_WRKEXE_G WHERE 1 = 1 AND EXE_SN = #{exe_sn}
/** * Query ID : selectRepoDBList * Description : RepoDB 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT DB_NM ,DB_EXP FROM T_DB_I D WHERE D.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id} AND D.USEYN='Y'
/** * Query ID : selectHaCnt * Description : HA 확인 조회 * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS haCnt FROM T_DBSVRIPADR_I WHERE DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id}
